body:
Need part 2
And some bastard linked this by the title and not the code so I thought this was a manga, searched it up on google and wadda you know..... luckily my hands are lightning fast
Just drink more of the anti hair growth stuff, who the fuck wants to be a guy?
Now give us a second part where he fucks his brother as a guy
Cool, dumbass should have drank a divine blessing to get rid of any negative status effects, that would have solved everything.

Part 2: Older brother buys hair removal formula, tricks lil bro into drinking it, more sexy time ensues.
Part 3: Younger brother - having kept the girl body, sneaks the removal formula into older brother while he's sleeping. Yuri time ensues.
Hey! That means i like easy sex!! Now i know my sexual preference!

I don't think it's the tags necessarily but the execution. There's no rationale for why he wanted his brother's dick. If he was gay, why did he change himself back voluntarily? It's a rather lame story on that front. They did the intro and yet it didn't seem to go anywhere meaningful. Then again, why am I critiquing hentai doujins? That's enough of this for today.
Who cares. If you either don't mind or actually like both themes then it isn't a problem.

@Watcher - I think it's about sexual access. The idea of easy sex that turns people on. Like lolicon and shotacon are largely about the power dynamic. The ShindoL one had all the boys in the class eager to get with the guy-turned-girl. The tension of boys acting like horny puppies and a pushover 'girl' struggling to keep refusing seemed sexy to me. This time, not so much.
I don't get the fetish of GB AND INCEST! One is fine but fucking your bro turned sis? No way.
The rotos scene, i can agree
